text.p: Following is a summary of major political and business stories in local newspapers, prepared by Reuters in Shanghai. Reuters has not checked the stories and does not guarantee their accuracy.

- SHANGHAI SECURITIES NEWS - Housing sales in the Lujiazui Finance and Trade Zone in the Pudong New Area have begun to rise in the past few months, indicating a new round of Pudong development is underway.
- Shanghai will launch a new investigation into bad assets in the finance sector to strengthen risk control.
- Deputy head of Tibetan Communist Party says that region will make the Shanghai stock exchange its first choice for listing firms.
- Shenyin & Wanguo Securities Co was the biggest B share trader in Shanghai in 1996.
- BUSINESS NEWS - Shanghai Petrochemical wins 300 million yuan loan from the Shanghai-based Communications Bank.
- The Communications Bank reports an annual 40 percent increase in assets in the past 10 years with total assets hitting 3.98 billion yuan at end-1996.
- Frauds in economic contracts rose sharply in 1996.
